verses.text: Except the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*keep the city, the watchman waketh butin vain.
It isvain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: forso he giveth his beloved sleep.
Lo, children arean heritage of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: andthe fruit of the womb is hisreward.
As arrows arein the hand of a mighty man; so arechildren of the youth.
Happy isthe man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
